Description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~

For educational institutions and production facilities managing multiple 
licenses of CINEMA 4D and BodyPaint 3D, MAXON offers a robust license server 
technology that makes the management of numerous licenses and groups of licenses 
with various configurations a breeze.

Network administrators can define groups, assign individual licenses, and define 
a unique lease time for each group. This means you can allow laptop users to extend 
their lease for off-site work, or give a specific project group access to additional 
licenses. All this control means you can make more efficient use of your investment 
in MAXON Software.
